title: Stuart Anderson – 2022 Comments on June 2022 By-Election Results
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Stuart Anderson, the Conservative MP for Wolverhampton South West, on 24 June 2022.
content: It was not a good night for us with the results that we have just had in the by-elections.
Only opposition parties win when we are divided. We need to listen, learn and unite behind Boris Johnson for the good of the country. This is the time for steady heads and focus.
